code: var AUTH_TOKEN_KEY_NAME='what-to-watch-token';var DATA_USER='data-user';export var getToken=function getToken(){var token=localStorage.getItem(AUTH_TOKEN_KEY_NAME);return token!==null&&token!==void 0?token:'';};export var getDataUser=function getDataUser(){var dataUser=localStorage.getItem(DATA_USER);return dataUser?JSON.parse(dataUser):'';};export var saveDataUser=function saveDataUser(data){localStorage.setItem(DATA_USER,data);};export var saveToken=function saveToken(token){localStorage.setItem(AUTH_TOKEN_KEY_NAME,token);};export var dropToken=function dropToken(){localStorage.removeItem(AUTH_TOKEN_KEY_NAME);};
